page.title: 16 Games/Play-Castle Kennedy
page.content: We play tig,football,houses,chase and races. Skipping is popular,three games are,'I had a little bumper car,number 48,whizzed me round the corner police caught me put me in jail how many bottles of ginger ale' and 'Cowboy Joe from Mexico went to ride on a rodeo, hands up stick em up drop your guns and pick em up. O.U.T spells out' and 'Wibble wobble wibble wobble jelly on a plate'. We play ball games such as Ali ba ba. The rhyme is 'Ali ba ba who's got the ball, is he big or is he small, has he whiskers on his chin, Ali ba ba who's got the ball'. Another one is Plainy Clappy. You throw a ball at a wall, sing the rhyme and do the actions. The rhyme is 'Plainy, Clappy, roll the wheels, tabacky,right hand, left hand, right leg, left leg, touch your toe, touch your heel, touch the ground and burl around'
